resources.string: Good morning Christine! My name is Oso, it\'s beary nice to meet you :3
I was created as part of an open source project to help bi-polar patients manage their symptoms
I am designed to listen and hopefully one day, be your best friend :)
Sometimes it can be diffcult to express how we\'re feeling and that\'s why I\'m here
I will be asking you a set of questions every two weeks to assess you manic-depressive state
It will take around 10 minutes. Are you ready?
what would you like oso to address you by?
would you like to receive notifications when Oso sends a message?
pick a theme for the app
By using Oso, you agree to our Terms and Privacy Policy
